page.title: 14LEISURE-TIME IN SHIPSTON
page.content:
Most people choose to watch television in their spare time.
We asked 60{adults}in Shipston-on- Stour how they spent their leisure time.38% of them chose to watch television,26% spent time on their hobbies,12% liked to do gardening, 10% liked to read a book,6% liked to go out and have a drink,5% liked to listen to the radio,2% took part in sports and 1% played records.
Then we asked 50{children}what they did in their leisure-time.48% of them liked to watch television,12% spent time on their hobbies,12% took part in sport,10% read a book,10% played records,8% chose to play.None chose to listen to the radio.
